notes.text:
This update for python-SQLAlchemy fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2019-7164: Fixed SQL Injection via the order_by parameter (bsc#1124593).
- CVE-2019-7548: Fixed SQL Injection via the group_by parameter (bsc#1124593).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: SQLAlchemy through 1.2.17 and 1.3.x through 1.3.0b2 allows SQL Injection via the order_by parameter.
notes.title: CVE description
